title: Greek Cos Salad
ingredients: ['1 cos lettuce - rinsed, dried and chopped', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '125g pitted black olives', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '2 large tomatoes, chopped', '1 cucumber, sliced', '150g crumbled feta cheese', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 lemon, juiced', 'ground black pepper to taste']
